English: The dividends will be paid out to shareholders on July 10 , 2008 at the latest , the company's president director , Ambono Janurianto , said here Wednesday .
Indonesia: Dividen ini akan dibagikan ke pemegang saham paling lambat 10 Juli 2008 , kata Dirut UNSP , Ambono Janurianto di Jakarta , Rabu .

English: The meeting also decided to reappoint incumbent members of the board of directors with Ambono Janurianto as president director and increase the number of members of the board of commissioners by appointing former agriculture minister Bungaran Saragih .
Indonesia: Selain itu dalam RUPS juga disetujui pengangkatan kembali direksi saat ini yang dikomandoi oleh Ambono Janurianto sebagai Dirut. Serta menambah pengurusan baru dengan mengangkat Mantan Menteri Pertanian , Bungaran Saragih sebagai komisaris .

English: Mining company PT Aneka Tambang Tbk Antam has temporarily ceased granite exploration operations on Piatu Hill in Kijang Bintan district , Riau Islands , after being officially informed the hill lies in a preserved forest area .
Indonesia: PT Aneka Tambang Tbk ANTM menghentikan sementara usaha penambangan batu granit , di Bukit Piatu , Kijang Bintan Kepulauan Riau. Pasalnya penambangan batu granit tersebut dilakukan di kawasan hutan lindung .

English: After receiving a Forestry Minister's circular issued in October 2007 , we sent a letter on April 25 to our partner in the project , PT Mitra Investindo Tbk , to stop the explorations , Antam's corporate secretary , Bimo Budi Satriyo , said here Friday .
Indonesia: Berdasarkan surat Menteri Kehutanan Oktober 2007 , maka pada 25 April lalu , kami mengirim surat kepada PT Mitra Investindo Tbk. selaku partner dalam proyek ini , untuk mengenhentikan sementara kegiatan penambangan , kata Sekretaris Perusahaan Antam , Bimo Budi Satriyo di Jakarta Jumat .

English: Bimo said the granite exploration area had become subject to a governmental investigation so continuing the exploration activity would make Antam as the concession-holder liable to legal sanctions .
Indonesia: Bimo mengatakan , lahan penambangan batu granit itu dalam status penyelidikan , sehingga apabila penambangan tetap dilanjutkan akan mengakibatkan dampak hukum yang serius bagi Antam sebagai pemegang Surat Izin Pertambangan Daerah SIPD .

English: PT Caraka later merged with PT Siwani Trimitra Tbk into a company which later became known as PT Mitra Investindo Tbk MITI while Antam's contract with PT Caraka was eventually taken over by MITI .
Indonesia: Selanjutnya , perseroan bergabung dengan PT Siwani Trimitra Tbk yang kemudian disebut sebagai PT Mitra Investindo Tbk. MITI. Dengan demikian seluruh kontrak Antam dengan Caraka Barata beralih kepada MITI .

English: The exploration contract was valid from June 11 , 2004 through June 10 , 2009 .
Indonesia: Kerja sama penambangan antara Antam dan PT. Caraka Berkat Sarana dimulai sejak 11 Juni 2004 hingga 10 Juni 2009 .

English: Now we are waiting for the result of the governmental investigation and the rechecking on the forest borders .
Indonesia: Saat ini kami masih menunggu hasil penyelidikan dan pengecekan ulang tata batas areal yang dilakukan Departemen Kehutanan ,

English: Therefore , the future of the ANTAM-MITI cooperation is still unclear .
Indonesia: jadi kelanjutan kerja sama Antam MITI belum dapat ditentukan .

English: Of course , we will adhere to the rules , Bimo said .
Indonesia: Tentunya kita akan patuhi sesuai aturan , kata Bimo .

English: He said , the temporary cessation of exploration activity would not have a significant impact on the company's income as granite was not its core business .
Indonesia: Menurut Bimo penghentian sementara kegiatan penambangan tidak memberi dampak signifikan terhadap pendapatan perseroan. Pasalnya , kegiatan ini bukan bisnis inti Antam dan hanya memberi kontribusi yang sangat kecil pada perseroan .

English: Under the cooperation agreement , Antam would get a S $ 0,35 fee on every ton of granite mined .
Indonesia: Berdasarkan kontrak kerja sama , Antam akan mendapat bayaran fee sebesar 0,35 dolar Singapura per ton ,

English: With a monthly granite production of 50,000 tons , the company would earn some S $ 17,500 per month or some S $ 210,000 per year from the granite mining venture .
Indonesia: sehingga dengan tingkat produksi per bulan yang mencapai 50.000 ton , maka Antam memperoleh pendapatan sekitar 17.500 dolar Singapura setiap bulan atau 210.000 dolar Singapura per tahun dari proyek penambangan batu granit ini .

English: The rupiah edged closer to Rp9,300 per dollar in the Jakarta interbank spot market on Wednesday evening following a rush on the greenback prior to the government's decision to raise fuel prices .
Indonesia: Kurs rupiah terhadap dolar AS di pasar spot antar bank Jakarta , Rabu sore hampir mencapai angka Rp9.300 per dolar AS , karena pelaku pasar makin memburu dolar AS menjelang pemerintah menaikkan harga bahan bakar minyak BBM .

English: The on-going student rallies to protest against the planned fuel price hike worried investors so they bought up dollard , Kostaman Thayib , retail banking director of PT Bank Mega , said on Wednesday .
Indonesia: Aksi demo mahasiswa yang berlanjut menimbulkan kekhawatiran pelaku dan mendorong mereka untuk terus membeli dolar AS , kata Direktur Retail Banking PT Bank Mega Tbk , Kostaman Thayib di Jakarta , Rabu .

English: The rupiah weakened by 37 points to Rp9,295 / 9,310 per dollar on Wednesday from Rp9,258 / 9,277 the day before .
Indonesia: Nilai tukar rupiah terhadap dolar AS melemah 37 poin menjadi Rp9.295 / 9.310 per dolar AS dibanding penutupan hari sebelumnya Rp9.258 / 9.277 .

English: He predicted the rupiah was likely to weaken to more than Rp9,300 per dollar prompting Bank Indonesia the central bank / BI to intervene in the money market .
Indonesia: Ia mengatakan , rupiah kemungkinan akan terus melemah hingga jauh di atas Rp9.300 per dolar AS , namun Bank Indonesia BI diperkirakan akan masuk pasar .

English: BI had foreign exchange reserves large enough to prevent the local unit from depreciating further , he said .
Indonesia: BI akan melakukan intervensi untuk mencegah rupiah terpuruk lebih jauh , apalagi BI mempunyai cadangan devisa yang cukup besar , ucapnya .

English: For the time being , the rupiah was under market pressure , he said adding the pressure would increase if global crude prices rose again .
Indonesia: Rupiah untuk sementara ini akan berada di bawah tekanan pasar dan tekanan itu akan semakin besar apabila harga minyak mentah dunia kembali bergejolak .

English: Another pressure on the rupiah was the weak regional share market triggered by a drop in the Wall Street's index , he said .
Indonesia: Apalagi pasar eksternal juga cenderung menekan rupiah , seperti pasar saham regional yang melemah akibat merosot bursa Wall Street , tuturnya .

English: He said the government's plan to raise fuel prices by up to 30 percent would have a negative impact on economic growth which had been projected at 6 percent for this year .
Indonesia: Menurut dia , rencana kenaikan harga BBM sebesar 30 persen akan menimbulkan berbagai dampak negatif terhadap pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional yang semula ditargetkan di atas 6 persen akan turun menjadi di bawah enam persen .

English: The unfavorable condition would affect the people's purchasing power and consequently , many investors would invest their capital abroad , he said .
Indonesia: Kondisi ini pada gilirannya akan menekan daya beli masyarakat semakin berkurang , akibatnya , banyak investor asing yang akan mengalihkan dananya ke pasar lain , ucapnya .

English: The government plans to raise fuel prices in late May to ease pressure on the state budget from the upward trend in global crude prices .
Indonesia: Meski saat ini investor asing masih bermain di pasar domestik , akibat selisih tingkat suku bunga rupiah terhadap dolar AS yang tinggi .

English: Suzuki motor-vehicle producer PT Indomobil Suzuki Internasional said it had yet to lower its sales target in the face of the government's plan to raise fuel oil prices in June 2008 .
Indonesia: Produsen kendaraan bermotor roda dua dan sepeda motor Suzuki belum akan menurunkan target penjualan meski pemerintah akan menaikkan harga bahan bakar minyak BBM pada awal Juni 2008 .

English: Our sales target does not change .
Indonesia: Target kami masih tetap ,

English: Our targets for cars and motor-cycles are 80,000 units and 900,000 units respectively in 2008 , PT Indomobil Suzuki Internasional President Director Subronto Laras said here on Wednesday .
Indonesia: Target kami masih tetap , yaitu 80.000 unit mobil pada 2008 dan 900.000 unit sepeda motor , kata Presiden Direktur PT Indomobil Suzuki Internasional , Subronto Laras , di Jakarta , Rabu .

English: He said during the first four months of 2008 , when prices of basic necessaries were on the increase , demand for motor vehicles was still high .
Indonesia: Menurut Subronto , selama empat bulan pertama tahun 2008 , atau di tengah kondisi harga-harga kebutuhan pokok telah melonjak sebelum kenaikan BBM direaliasikan , permintaan terhadap otomotif justru masih tinggi .

English: There is exceptional demand .
Indonesia: Terjadi ' over demand ' kelebihan permintaan yang luar biasa .

English: Suzuki motorcycle sales reached 250,000 units , he said .
Indonesia: Penjualan sepeda motor Suzuki selama periode itu mencapai 250.000 unit , ujarnya .

English: In spite of this fact , however , Subronto said his company would continue to anticipate various possibilities that could happen after fuel oil prices were hiked in June , 2008 .
Indonesia: Meski demikian Subronto menjelaskan , pihaknya tetap mengantisipasi berbagai kemungkinan yang terjadi pasca kenaikan BBM yang dijadwalkan mulai awal Juni 2008 .

English: We will see the conditions first .
Indonesia: Kita melihat situasinya .

English: We can just take anticipative steps in the form of delaying the marketing of new brand like the 2,400 cc Grand Vitara which consumes fuel more wasteful then its previous generation , he said .
Indonesia: Bisa saja antisipasi dilakukan dengan menunda dulu penjualan merek baru , seperti Grand Vitara 2.400 cc , yang logikanya agak boros bahan bakar dibanding seri sebelumnya , katanya .

English: The same thing could also apply to ' matic scooter ' motorcycle which is more two times fuel wasteful than that of the ' bebek ' type , whose price is lower .
Indonesia: Demikian halnya dengan sepeda motor jenis skutermatic yang dua kali lebih boros bahan bakar dibanding sepeda motor jenis bebek dengan harga yang lebih murah .

English: In the last two years , demand for ' matic ' scooter motorcycles increased 25 percent of total Suzuki motorcycle sales .
Indonesia: Dalam dua tahun terakhir permintaan skutermatic melonjak hingga sekitar 25 persen dari total penjualan sepeda motor Suzuki .

English: This has caught our attention to see whether fuel oil price hikes would change the market's behavior , Subronto said .
Indonesia: Ini menjadi perhatian kita , apakah dengan kenaikan harga BBM terjadi perubahan karakter pasar , katanya .

English: He hoped that the impact of fuel oil price increases could well be anticipated because the current conditions were different from those when the government raised fuel oil prices in 2005 .
Indonesia: Untuk itu ia berharap , dampak kenaikan BBM saat ini bisa diantiapasi dengan baik karena berbeda saat pemerintah menaikkan harga BBM pada tahun 2005 .

English: At that time , sales dropped 40 percent .
Indonesia: Ketika itu tahun 2005-2006 penjualan kendaraan bermotor anjlok hingga 40 persen .

English: The impact this year at least is expected on the industry , he added .
Indonesia: Tahun ini diharapkan dampaknya minimal terhadap industri , katanya .

English: Prediction that this year the impact of fuel oil price hikes would not as worse as those in 2005 was also voiced by president director of Bank Mandiri , Agus Martowardojo .
Indonesia: Keyakinan bahwa dampak kenaikan BBM tahun ini tidak separah tahun 2005 juga disampaikan Dirut Bank Mandiri Agus Martowardojo .

English: Because the price increase in 2005 was 100 percent , all sectors of businesses felt its impact , though world oil price at that time was only US $ 60 per barrel , he said .
Indonesia: Menurutnya , meski harga minyak di pasar internasional tahun 2005 hanya 60 dolar AS per barel karena didorong kenaikan BBM dalam negeri hingga sekitar 100 persen mengakibatkan seluruh sektor tertekan .

English: Senior Deputy Governor of Bank Indonesia BI , the central bank Miranda S. Goeltom said she strongly believed the expected high inflation rate due to the increase in fuel oil prices can last for a shorter period than that in 2005 .
Indonesia: Bank Indonesia BI menyatakan keyakinannya bahwa meningkatnya inflasi sebagai dampak dari kenaikan harga BBM dapat dipersingkat jika dibanding dampak kenaikan harga BBM pada tahun 2005 .

English: We strongly believe that if all government policies are in tandem with BI's policies , the duration of the high inflation rate as the impact of the increase in fuel oil prices can be shorthened , Miranda said here Thursday .
Indonesia: Kami punya keyakinan besar , jika semua kebijakan pemerintah dan kebijakan BI bisa berjalan ' intandem ' berjalan searah , maka dampak berupa inflasi yang meningkat bisa diperpendek , kata Deputi Gubernur Senior BI , Miranda S. Goeltom di Jakarta , Kamis .

English: She said the high inflation rate as the impact of the increase in fuel oil prices in 2005 by more than 100 percent abated only after three to four months .
Indonesia: Miranda menyebutkan , ketika pemerintah menaikkan harga BBM pada tahun 2005 lebih dari 100 persen , dampak berupa inflasi yang tinggi baru mereda setelah sekitar tiga hingga 4 bulan kemudian .

English: That the fuel oil price hike would indeed bring about a high annual inflation rate , but we believe this time the duration of the high inflation rate can be shortened compared with that in 2005 , she said .
Indonesia: Memang itu akan berdampak kepada inflasi tahunan yang besar , tapi kami yakin bisa diperpendek dibanding tahun 2005 , katanya .

English: Asked how big the impact of the 28.7 percent increase in the fuel oil prices on the inflation rate would be , Miranda said it would depend on the first effect only in terms of the increase in the fuel oil prices or the second effect .
Indonesia: Mengenai berapa besar dampak kenaikan harga BBM sebesar 28,7 persen terhadap tingkat inflasi , Miranda mengatakan , besarnya akan tergantung dari apakah hanya dari sisi kenaikan harga BBM-nya saja first effect atau efek bergandanya atau second effect .

English: We should remember that monetary policies will not react to the current or past inflation rates but we react to the inflation expectation .
Indonesia: Harap diingat bahwa kebijakan moneter tidak bereaksi terhadap inflasi saat ini atau masa lalu tetapi kita bereaksi terhadap ekspektasi inflasi .

English: We will make the necessary policies to minimize the possible impacts in the future , she said .
Indonesia: Kita akan melakukan kebijakan yang diperlukan untuk meminimalisasi dampaknya ke depan , katanya .

English: On the possibility of BI making tight monetary policies by increasing the interest rate , she said BI would make the necessary monetary policies , adding that the expected policies would depend on the latest information .
Indonesia: Sementara itu mengenai kemungkinan BI melaksanakan kebijakan moneter yang ketat dengan menaikkan tingkat bunga , Miranda mengatakan , kebijakan yang akan dilakukan adalah kebijakan moneter yang dibutuhkan. Apakah akan ketat atau longgar akan tergantung kepada informasi terakhir yang ada .

English: We know that if the inflation rate continues to rise and the central bank gives no signal that it will be able to maintain the inflation rate well , it will have an impact on the economy , she said .
Indonesia: Kita tahu bahwa apabila ekspektasi inflasi terus meningkat , kemudian dari bank sentral tidak ada signal bahwa bank sentral akan mampu menjaga innflasi ke depan terjaga dengan baik , maka justru perekonomisannya akan terkena imbas .

English: She admitted that the latest information showed inflationary pressures would continue .
Indonesia: Ia mengakui , informasi terakhir memang menunjukkan bahwa tekanan inflasi masih terus ada .

English: The high inflation rate in the world had yet to abate and the world's economic conditions were still uncertain .
Indonesia: Kecenderungan peningkatan inflasi meningat di dunia belum mereda , dan masih ada ketidakpastian kondisi perekonomian dunia .

English: We will take all variables into account before making a decision .
Indonesia: Kami akan perhitungkan semua variabel-variabel itu sebelum memutuskan .

English: What the decision will be , just until next month , she said .
Indonesia: Keputusannya tentu tunggu sampai bulan depan , kata Miranda .

English: The bond , the second of its kind to be issued this year , would carry a coupon of 10.375-10.875 percent payable every quarter , the company's president director , Wahzary Wardaya , said on Wednesday .
Indonesia: Tingkat bunga yang ditawarkan sekitar 10,375 sampai 10,875 persen dan akan dibayarkan setiap triwulan , sementara pelunasannya akan dilakukan secara penuh pada saat jatuh tempo bullet payment , kata Dirut PT Danareksa Wahzary Wardaya di Jakarta , Rabu .

English: The company had appointed PT Danareksa Sekuritas , PT Citigroup Securities Indonesia and PT Trimegah Securities as bond issue underwriters , he said .
Indonesia: Bertindak sebagai penjamin pelaksana emisi obligasi yakni PT Danareksa Sekuritas , PT Citigroup Securities Indonesia dan PT Trimegah Securities .

English: PT Danareksa posted a net profit of Rp98 billion last year .
Indonesia: Sampai akhir 2006 pendapatan usaha perseroan sebesar Rp335 miliar dengan laba bersih Rp98 miliar .

English: In the first semester of 2007 , the company's net profit jumped four-fold to Rp83 billion from the pevious semester thanks to a Rp219.4 billion increase in operational income .
Indonesia: sampai akhir semester 2007 perseroan mencatat laba bersih sebesar Rp83 miliar atau naik empat kali lipat dibandingkan periode sama sebelumnya. Kenaikan laba bersih ini dipicu oleh naiknya pendapatan usaha menjadi Rp219,4 miliar dibandingkan periode sama sebelumnya Rp158,4 miliar .

English: Indonesia's monthly inflation rose 0.72 percent in July , bringing the calender inflation rate to 2.81 percent and the year-on-year inflation rate to 6.06 percent , Central Bureau of Statistics BPS chief Rusman Heriawan said on Wednesday .
Indonesia: BPS mencatat Indonesia mengalami inflasi 0,72 persen pada Juli 2007 , sehingga inflasi tahun kalender Januari-Juli 2007 tercatat 2,81 persen , dan inflasi year on year Juli 2007 terhadap Juli 2006 tercatat 6,06 persen .

English: But he added he believed the country could hit the full-year inflation target of 6 percent at the end of this year as the year-on-year inflation figure stood at 6.06 percent .
Indonesia: Namun demikian , Kepala BPS Rusman Heriawan di Gedung BPS Jakarta , Kamis mengatakan target inflasi pemerintah 6 persen pada akhir tahun 2007 masih akan bisa dicapai , mengingat inflasi year on year yang masih 6,06 persen .

English: So , we are focusing on the year-on-year inflation rate which still reaches 6.06 percent .
Indonesia: Jadi yang kita lihat sekarang year on year itu kan masih 6,06 persen .

English: If the patterns remain the same as in previous years when inflationary pressures occurred in September and October , we will certainly stick to the inflation target of 6 percent , he said .
Indonesia: Kalau pola-pola yang terjadi akan seperti tahun lalu , dimana ada tekanan inflasi pada September dan Oktober , tentu angka 6 persen bisa kita pegang , kata Rusman .

English: The fairly high inflation rate was caused by annual patterns like in the previous year due to the start of the academic year and a significant increase in the prices of foodstuffs , he said .
Indonesia: Menurutnya , angka inflasi yang cukup tinggi itu merupakan pola tahunan yang juga terjadi pada tahun sebelumnya , akibat datangnya musim tahun ajaran baru , disamping terjadinya kenaikan harga yang cukup signifikan pada kelompok bahan makanan .

English: The prices of foodstuffs contributed 1.35 percent and education , recreation and sports 2.89 percent to July's inflation rate , he said .
Indonesia: Sumbangan kelompok bahan makanan pada inflasi Juli mencapai 1,35 persen dan kelompok pendidikan , rekreasi , dan olahraga 2,89 persen .

English: The annual cycle is educational costs as July is the start of academic year .
Indonesia: Yang jadi siklus tahunan itu biaya pendidikan karena bulan Juli ini tahun ajaran baru dimulai .

English: The monthly inflation rates in July 2006 and July 2005 were respectively 0.46 percent and 0.78 percent , he said .
Indonesia: Pada tahun 2006 inflasi Juli 0,46 persen dan inflasi Juli 20050,78 persen , katanya

English: The price of purebred chicken meat rose 8.86 percent due to limited supplies , contributing 0.13 percent to the monthly inflation rate , he said .
Indonesia: Untuk kelompok bahan makanan , dia menjelaskan , harga daging ayam ras 8,86 persen akibat terbatasnya ketersediaan barang sehingga menyumbang 0,13 persen pada inflasi ,

English: A 6.32 percent rise in the prices of egg and a 1.4 percent increase in the prices of fresh fish contributed 0.04 percent and 0.06 percent respectively to the inflation , he said .
Indonesia: telur ayam naik 6,32 persen dan menyumbang 0,04 , serta ikan segar naik 1,4 persen hingga menyumbang 0,06 persen pada inflasi .

English: Meanwhile , educational costs at the elementary school , junior high school and senior high school levels rose 10 percent , 8.4 percent and 4.5 percent respectively , adding another 0.07 percent , 0.05 percent and 0.04 percent to the overall rate , he said .
Indonesia: Dan untuk kelompok pendidikan , katanya , kenaikan biaya sekolah pada tingkat SD , SMP , dan SMA yang masing-masing mencapai 10 persen , 8,4 persen , dan 4,5 persen menyumbang 0,07 persen , 0,05 persen dan 0,04 persen pada inflasi .

English: He predicted that educational costs would remain the source of inflation in August when the academic year for institutes of higher learning began .
Indonesia: Dia juga mengungkapkan , pada bulan Agustus ini sumbangan pendidikan terhadap inflasi juga diperkirakan masih tinggi karena tahun ajaran baru untuk perguruan tinggi juga baru dimulai .

English: July's inflation was also fueled by a 1.7 percent rise in the prices of cooking oil and a 8.5 percent increase in security costs which contributed 0.02 percent and 0.03 percent respectively to the overall rate , he said .
Indonesia: Selain dua kelompok tersebut , kata Rusman , inflasi juga disebabkan oleh kenaikan harga minyak goreng 1,7 persen pada Juli hingga menyumbang 0,02 persen pada inflasi dan kenaikan biaya keamanan 8,5 persen hingga menyumbang 0,03 persen .

English: He said last month's core inflation rate clocked in at 0.71 percent , bringing the core calender inflation to 2.83 percent and the core year-on-year inflation to 5.75 percent .
Indonesia: BPS mencatat inflasi inti pada Juli mencapai 0,71 persen , sehingga inflasi inti tahun kalender 2,83 persen dan inflasi inti year on year mencapai 5,75 persen

English: Bank Indonesia the central bank / BI decided Thursday to keep its key rate at 8.25 percent for the third month in a row while still carefully considering the impact of the subprime mortgage turmoil despite the country's improving macro economic conditions and the rupiah's stable exchange rate .
Indonesia: Bank Indonesia BI kembali mempertahankan BI rate suku bunga acuan BI pada level 8,25 persen karena masih mempertimbangkan prinsip kehati-hatian atas dampak krisis subprime mortgage krisis kredit perumahan di Amerika Serikat AS meski stabilitas makro ekonomi nasional tetap terjaga .

English: The meeting of Bank Indonesia's board of governors today decided to maintain the BI Rate at 8.25 percent after making a comprehensive evaluation of the prospects of the inflation rate in 2007 , and projected economic developments where the impact of the sub prime mortgage turmoil is still felt , Budi Mulia , director of the central bank's strategic planning and public relations , said .
Indonesia: Rapat Dewan Gubernur RDG BI hari ini memutuskan untuk mempertahankan BI rate pada tingkat 8,25 persen setelah melakukan evaluasi menyeluruh terhadap prospek pencapaian inflasi , proyeksi perkembangan perekonomian dunia di mana masalah ' subprime mortgage ' masih terasa , kata Direktur Perencanaan Strategis dan Hubungan Masyarakat seusai RDG BI di Jakarta , Kamis .

English: He said BI would keep monitoring the impact of the subprime mortgage turmoil and the possibility of the US economic slowdown affecting the Indonesian economy .
Indonesia: Ia mengatakan , BI tetap mencermati dampak masih berlanjutnya gejolak subprime mortgage dan kemungkinan potensi pelemahan ekonomi AS yang berakibat pada perekonomian domestik .

English: The central bank was upbeat that the country could hit the full-year inflation target of 6 , plus and minus 1 , percent for this year , he said .
Indonesia: Selain itu , menurut dia BI tetap yakin target inflasi hingga akhir tahun 2007 sebesar enam plus minus satu akan tercapai .

English: BI noted the consumer price index inflation in August rose to an on-year 6.51 percent from 6.06 percent a month earlier .
Indonesia: Menurut dia , BI mencatat inflasi IHK IHK secara tahunan pada Agustus mencapai 6,51 persen lebih tinggi dibandingkan Juli 6,06 persen .

English: Meanwhile , the bank put core inflation which excludes volatile food prices and administered fuel prices , at a yearly 5.66 percent in August compared to 5.75 percent in the month before .
Indonesia: Sedangkan inflasi inti Agustus mencapai 5,66 persen lebih rendah dibandingkan bulan sebelumnya 5,75 persen .

English: The increase in August's inflation was chiefly fueled by a rise in the prices of volatile foods with cooking oil , eggs and rice contributing the most to the inflation figure , he said .
Indonesia: Peningkatan inflasi bulan Agustus terutama disebabkan oleh kenaikan inflasi pada kelompok harga makanan yang bergejolak dengan penyumbang terbesar minyak goreng , telur ayam ras , dan beras , katanya .

English: He said BI also noted the increase in the administered prices of commodities such as kerosene contributed to last month's inflation .
Indonesia: Selain itu , menurut dia BI mencatat adanya kenaikan dari kelompok komoditas yang harganya dikendalikan oleh pemerintah sejalan dengan meningkatnya harga minyak tanah .

English: The central bank estimated the economy would expand 6.2 percent in the third quarter of 2007 .
Indonesia: Sementara itu , ia mengatakan BI memperkirakan pertumbuhan ekonomi pada triwulan III 2007 mencapai 6,2 persen .

English: The growth will be driven by exports , private consumption and investment .
Indonesia: Pertumbuhan tersebut didukung oleh pertumbuhan sektor ekspor , konsumsi swasta , dan investasi .

English: Investment will increase as a result of investors' optimism and financing support , he said .
Indonesia: Membaiknya kegiatan investasi tersebut terutama ditopang oleh optimisme investor dan dukungan pembiayaan katanya .

English: Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Boediono said Bank Indonesia the central bank / BI's decision to cut its benchmark rate by another 25 basis points to 8.75 percent matches the country's current macro economic conditions .
Indonesia: Menko Perekonomian Boediono menilai kebijakan Bank Indonesia menurunkan suku bunga acuan BI Rate sebesar 25 basis poin dari 8,75 persen menjadi 8,50 persen merupakan kebijakan yang baik sesuai dengan kondisi makro ekonomi saat ini .

English: It the interest rate policy is in line with the declining inflation rate , the rupiah's stable exchange rate , and the strong foreign investment inflows .
Indonesia: Itu sudah sesuai dengan inflasi yang menurun , kurs rupiah yang stabil , dan arus dana asing yang masih cukup kuat .

English: I think the policy is on the right track , he said following a limited cabinet meeting here on Thursday .
Indonesia: Saya kira kebijakan suku bunga sudah baik , kata Boediono usai Sidang Kabinet di Kantor Presiden , di Jakarta , Kamis .

English: The drop in the key rate known as BI Rate was expected to lead to a positive sentiment which would eventually speed up the growth of the real sector , he said .
Indonesia: Menurut Boediono penurunan BI Rate ini diharapkan menjadi sentimen positif untuk mendorong percepatan pertumbuhan sektor riil .

English: Meanwhile , Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati expressed hope that the government-set inflation rate target of 6 percent for 2007 could be achieved , thereby it provided a leeway for the BI Rate to drop further .
Indonesia: Sementara itu di tempat yang sama Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengharapkan laju inflasi pada akhir tahun bisa sesuai target sebesar enam persen sehingga suku bunga BI Rate bisa turun kembali .

English: However , she added the drop in the benchmark rate would still have no impact on the target of the deficit in the 2007 state budget as government spending would also increase .
Indonesia: Namun menurut Menkeu , penurunan BI Rate ini belum berpengaruh terhadap target devisit APBN 2007 karena adanya beberapa tambahan pengeluaran yang juga naik .

English: Interest rate will fall and accordingly , interest spending and exchange rate for several instalments on foreign debts will drop .
Indonesia: Suku bunga memang turun , sehingga pengeluaran bunga juga turun dan kurs untuk beberapa cicilan utang luar negeri juga turun .

English: But several spending will also increase , she said .
Indonesia: Tapi kan beberapa pengeluaran juga agak naik , katanya .

English: The House of Representatives DPR on Tuesday passed a bill on the third amendment to the 1983 law on general taxation arrangements and procedures into law .
Indonesia: Seluruh fraksi DPR akhirnya menyetujui Pengesahan Rancangan Undang-undang RUU tentang Perubahan Ketiga UU No.6 / 1983 tentang Ketentuan Umum dan Tata Cara Perpajakan KUP menjadi UU ,

English: Only the National Mandate Party PAN faction agreed to the passage of the bill into law with reservations .
Indonesia: kecuali Fraksi PAN yang menyetujui dengan keberatan .

English: Chief of the PAN faction Zulkifli Hasan said his faction had objections to the term ' taxpayer ' which it said did not give equal treatment to tax officials , the creation of a tax-receiving agency to replace the Directorate General of Taxes , and the process of filing taxpayers' objections and appeals over tax assessments .
Indonesia: Fraksi PAN , melalui Ketua fraksinya Zulkifli Hasan , menyampaikan persetujuannya atas amandemen UU tersebut , dengan tiga keberatan , yaitu terkait dengan istilah wajib pajak yang dianggap tidak menciptakan perlakuan yang sama dengan aparat pajak , pembentukan Badan Penerima Perpajakan BPP untuk menggantikan Ditjen Pajak , dan terkait dengan proses pengajuan keberatan dan banding oleh wajib pajak .

English: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati said she was fully aware of the faction's objections , adding the government was convinced that the process of filing objections and appeals over tax assessments would instead protect taxpayers' rights and ensure a sense of justice for taxpayers .
Indonesia: Sementara itu Menkeu Sri Mulyani Indrawati saat menyampaikan pendapat akhir pemerintah menyatakan , pihaknya memahami keberatan FPAN tentang proses pengajuan keberatan dan banding oleh wajib pajak , namun pemerintah berkeyakinan bahwa prosedur keberatan dan banding tersebut justru memberikan penguatan bagi perlindungan hak-hak wajib pajak dan lebih menjamin rasa keadilan bagi wajib pajak .

English: On the fear of potential losses , the government has made objective and careful calculations that no state receipts will be lost but the process may only lead to a delay in state receipts , she said .
Indonesia: Berkenaan dengan ' potential loss' yang dikhawatirkan , pemerintah melakukan perhitungan secara objektif dan hati-hati sehingga penerimaan negara tidaklah hilang , tetapi memang dapat terjadi penundaan penerimaan , kata Menkeu .

English: Under the newly-amended law , taxpayers may have a small chance of applying for deferred tax payments by filing objections or appeals over tax assessments for fear that they would be subject to 50 percent fines if their objections were rejected and 100 percent fines if their appeals were turned down , she said .
Indonesia: Menkeu menjelaskan , dengan UU sekarang , wajib pajak kecil kemungkinan mencoba mengajukan penundaan pembayaran dengan cara mengajukan keberatan atau banding karena ada resiko sanksi administrasi berupa denda 50 persen dalam hal keberatan ditolak dan 100 persen jika permohonan banding ditolak .

English: On the faction's objection to the creation of a tax receiving agency , she said the government opined that the method of managing state receipts and expenditures still needed to be revised and hormonized as well as coordinated and improved administrative and operational procedures under one-stop service to ensure the effectiveness and efficiency of the method .
Indonesia: Sedangkan terhadap keberatan FPAN tentang pembentukan BPP sebagai pengganti Ditjen Pajak , Menkeu menjelaskan bahwa pemerintah masih menganggap pengelolaan penerimaan dan pengeluaran negara masih harus dalam satu atap karena masih diperlukannya penyempurnaan dan penyerasian kebijakan , koordinasi dan perbaikan administrasi teknis dan operasionalnya .

English: The minister said the term ' taxpayer ' was not identical to tax depositor because the former covered tax withholder , tax collector and tax depositor .
Indonesia: Sementara terhadap keberatan tentang istilah wajib pajak , Menkeu menjelaskan , pemerintah berpendapat istilah wajib pajak tidak identik dengan pembayar pajak karena istilah wajib pajak memiliki cakupan yang lebih luas , yaitu pemotong pajak , pemungut pajak , dan penyetor pajak .

English: A change in the term will have a fairly significant impact as the term ' taxpayer ' is already widely known .
Indonesia: Perubahan istilah tersebut akan membawa dampak yang cukup signifikan , disamping istilah ' wajib pajak ' telah dikenal luas di masyarakat .

English: So , if we replace it with ' tax depositor ' it will take a long time to popularize it , she said .
Indonesia: Jadi apabila diganti dengan istilah ' pembayar pajak ' , justru akan memerlukan waktu lama untuk memasyarakatkan lagi , katanya .

English: She agreed with the Golkar Party faction's proposal for the formation of a taxation committee as an independent supervisory institute responsible to the finance minister .
Indonesia: Menkeu juga menyatakan persetujuannya dengan usulan Fraksi Partai Golkar FPG tentang pembentukan komite perpajakan sebagai lembaga pengawas independen dan bertanggung jawab kepada Menkeu .

English: The government is aware of this view .
Indonesia: Pemerintah memahami pandangan ini dan

English: Hopefully , the creation of this taxation supervisory commission will curb abuse and misappropriation of taxes withheld , she said .
Indonesia: dengan dibentuknya Komite Pengawas Perpajakan ini diharapkan dapat mengurangi penyalahgunaan dan penyimpangan dalam pelaksanaan pemungutan pajak , katanya .

English: The Indonesian government has lowered its global oil price assumption in the revised 2007 state budget from US $ 63 to US $ 60 per barrel despite an upward trend in the global oil price .
Indonesia: Pemerintah tidak merisaukan kenaikan harga minyak internasional sehingga kenaikan harga minyak internasional yang terjadi saat ini direspon dengan penurunan asumsi dalam APBNP 2007 menjadi 60 dolar AS dari sebelumnya 63 dolar AS per barel .

English: Yes , that is the best thing to do .
Indonesia: Ya itu yang terbaik .

English: Basically , what we have discussed in the revised state budget are the best throughout this year , Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Boedino said after installing 21 second echelon officials here Wednesday .
Indonesia: Pokoknya yang kita bahas di APBNP itu rata-rata yang terbaik sepanjang tahun ini , kata Menko Perekonomian Boediono usai melantik 21 pejabat eselon II di lingkungan Kementerian Koordinator Perekonomian di Jakarta , Rabu .

English: He said global oil prices always fluctuated all the time so it was not easy to predict an annual average oil price .
Indonesia: Menurut Boediono , harga minyak selalu menunjukkan adanya kenaikan pada suatu kurun waktu tertentu dan adanya penurunan pada kurun waktu lainnya , yang tidak dapat dengan mudah diperkirakan atau diprediksi berapa rata-rata harganya selama satu tahun .

English: We stick to the average price in the revised state budget for this year .
Indonesia: Kita pegang saja angka rata-rata yang ada di APBNP sebagai pegangan selama setahun ini .

English: About the realization , let's wait as we are still in the middle of the year , he said .
Indonesia: Itu yang kita pegang dulu , realisasinya tunggu saja , karena ini kan juga masih di pertengahan tahun , katanya .

English: In lowering the global oil price assumption , he said the government had certainly considered oil subsidy , kerosene subsidy in particular .
Indonesia: Ia menyebutkan , penurunan asumsi harga minyak internasional dalam APBNP 2007 itu tentu sudah diikuti dengan perhitungan subsidi terutama subsidi minyak tanah .

English: The price of Indonesia's crude oil reached its lowest level early this year but moved up to US $ 69.14 a barrel in June 2007 .
Indonesia: Harga minyak mentah Indonesia pada awal 2007 mencapai titik terndah , namun kembali meningkat mencapai sekitar 69,14 dolar AS per barel pada Juni 2007 .

English: The Finance Ministry predicted the price of Indonesian crude in the global market averaged US $ 62.93 a barrel in the first half of 2007 .
Indonesia: Departemen Keuangan memperkirakan dalam semester I 2007 , rata-rata harga minyak mentah Indonesia di pasar internasional mencapai 62,93 dolar AS per barel .

English: The average price of Indonesian crude is expected to reach US $ 58.6 a barrel in the second semester and US $ 60 a barrel throughout this year , or US $ 3 lower than the initial assumption of US $ 63 a barrel in the 2007 state budget .
Indonesia: Sementara pada semester II 2007 , rata-rata harga minyak mentah Indonesia di pasar internasional diperkirakan sebesar 58,6 dolar AS per barel , sehingga selama 2007 rata-rata harga minyak Indonesia diperkirakan mencapai 60 dolar AS per barel , atau tiga dolar AS lebih rendah dari asumsi awal APBN 2007 sebesar 63,0 dolar AS per barel .

English: The government has issued state bonds worth Rp773.023 trillion until July 17 this year , consisting of tradable notes worth Rp512.590 trillion and non-tradable notes worth Rp260.433 trillion .
Indonesia: Pemerintah telah menerbitkan Surat Berharga Negara SBN mencapai Rp773,023 triliun hingga 17 Juli 2007 , yang terdiri atas SBN yang diperdagangkan Rp512,590 triliun dan SBN yang tidak diperdagangkan Rp260,433 triliun ,

English: The state bonds represented a 0.8 percent drop compared to the period ended on June 27 , 2007 when they reached Rp779.048 trillion , the Directorate General of Debt Management at the Finance Ministry said in its official website on Wednesday .
Indonesia: atau turun 0,8 persen dari posisi pada 27 Juni 2007 Rp779,048 triliun. Menurut data Ditjen Pengelolaan Utang Depkeu yang ada di laman internetnya , Rabu ,

English: The tradable bonds comprised long-term bonds worth Rp499.174 trillion , retail bonds worth Rp9.516 trillion and short-term bonds worth Rp3.9 trillion .
Indonesia: dari seluruh SBN yang diperdagangkan , Rp499,174 triliun merupakan obligasi jangka panjang SUN , Rp9,516 triliun merupakan obligasi ritel ORI , dan Rp3,9 triliun merupakan obligasi jangka pendek SPN .

English: It said fixed-rate bonds issued until July 17 reached Rp591.489 trillion , including US dollar-denominated bonds worth Rp63.770 trillion .
Indonesia: Data itu juga menunjukkan bahwa SBN yang memiliki suku bunga tetap fixed coupon mencapai Rp591,489 triliun

English: The fixed-rate bonds accounted for 60.21 percent of the total .
Indonesia: atau 60,21 persen , termasuk Rp63,770 triliun obligasi dalam denominasi dolar AS kurs Rp9.110 per dolar AS , dan

English: Variable-rate bonds reached Rp177.633 trillion or 38.92 percent of the total , while zero-coupon bonds stood at Rp3.9 trillion or 0.87 percent of the total .
Indonesia: SBN yang memiliki bunga mengambang variable coupon Rp177,633 triliun atau 38,92 persen , serta SBN yang memiliki bunga nol zero coupon Rp3,9 triliun atau 0,87 persen .

English: It said a number of state bonds would mature between 2007 and 2009 .
Indonesia: Ditjen Pengelolaan Utang Depkeu juga mencatat adanya beberapa obligasi negara yang jatuh tempo dalam kurun waktu 2007-2009 .

English: The state bond that will fall due on Sept 25 , 2007 will be series VR0012 bond worth Rp4.850 trillion .
Indonesia: Obligasi negara yang jatuh tempo pada 2007 hanya Rp4,850 triliun untuk seri VR0012 yang akan jatuh tempo pada 25 September 2007 .

English: The state bonds that will become due in 2008 will reach Rp30.848 trillion , namely series FR0041 bond worth Rp1.1 trillion due on Nov 15 , series VR0013 bond worth Rp7.771 trillion due on Jan 25 , series VR0014 bond worth Rp9.272 trillion due on Aug 25 , series VR0015 bond worth Rp8.805 trillion due on Dec 25 and series SPN 2008052801 bond worth Rp3.9 trillion due on May 28 .
Indonesia: Obligasi negara yang jatuh tempo pada 2008 mencapai Rp30,848 triliun , yaitu seri FR0041 senilai Rp1,1 triliun jatuh tempo pada 15 November 2008 , seri VR0013 senilai Rp7,771 triliun jatuh tempo pada 25 Januari 2008 , seri VR0014 senilai Rp9,272 triliun jatuh tempo pada 25 Agustus 2008 , dan seri VR0015 senilai Rp8,805 triliun jatuh tempo pada 25 Desember 2008 , serta seri SPN 2008052801 senilai Rp3,9 triliun yang jatuh tempo pada 28 Mei 2008 .

English: The state bonds that will mature in 2009 will reach Rp31.275 trillion , namely series FR0002 bond worth Rp15.602 trillion due on June 15 , series ORI001 bond worth Rp3.283 trillion due on Aug 9 , series VR0016 bond worth Rp9.434 trillion due on July 25 , and series SU-005 bond worth Rp2.956 trillion due on Dec 10 .
Indonesia: Obligasi negara yang jatuh tempo pada 2009 mencapai Rp31,275 triliun , yaitu seri FR0002 senilai Rp15,602 triliun jatuh tempo pada 15 Juni 2009 , ORI001 senilai Rp3,283 triliun jatuh tempo pada 9 Agustus 2009 , seri VR0016 senilai Rp9,434 triliun jatuh tempo pada 25 Juli 2009 , dan seri SU-005 senilai Rp2,956 triliun yang jatuh tempo pada 10 Desember 2009 .

English: PT Holcim Indonesia Tbk SMCB , a cement producer , suffered a significant drop in its net profit in the first semester of 2007 , the company said in a report .
Indonesia: Produsen semen PT Holcim Indonesia Tbk SMCB mengalami penurunan laba bersih yang signifikan selama semester pertama 2007 ,

English: Holcim's net profit in the first half of 2007 decreased significantly by 95.8 percent compared to that in the same period last year .
Indonesia: anjlok 95,8 persen dibandingkan periode sama sebelumnya .

English: However , during the period under review , its sales grew by 16.6 percent to Rp1.608 trillion , according to a report on Holcim's financial performance released on Tuesday
Indonesia: Meski begitu pada periode sama penjualannya tumbuh 16,6 persen menjadi Rp 1,608 triliun , demikian laporan kinerja keuangan Holcim yang dipublikasikan Selasa .

English: In the first semester of 2007 , Holcim gained a net profit of Rp5.76 billion only , a sharp decrease from last year's net profit in the same period last year when the figure was Rp139.13 billion .
Indonesia: Sepanjang semester pertama 2007 Holcim hanya mencetak laba bersih sebesar Rp5,76 miliar , padahal pada periode sama sebelumnya laba bersih Holcim sebesar Rp139,13 miliar .

English: The lower profit was among other things due to an increase in interest costs , exchange rate losses , and severance pay burden coast which all added up to Rp123.458 billion .
Indonesia: Anjloknya laba bersih lebih disebabkan melonjaknya biaya bunga , rugi kurs , serta beban uang pisah sebesar Rp123,458 miliar .

English: Around 77 percent of the shares of Holcim which was previously known as Cibinong Cement are currently owned by Holdervin BV .
Indonesia: Holcim yang dulu bernama Semen Cibinong , saat ini 77 persen sahamnya dikuasai Holdervin BV .

English: Foreign ownership of rupiah-denominated state bonds in June 2007 rose 47.6 percent to Rp81.78 trillion from Rp55.40 trillion in June 2006 but fell 2 percent from Rp83.48 trillion in May 2007 , the Finance Ministry said .
Indonesia: Departemen Keuangan mencatat kepemilikan Surat Berharga Negara SBN domestik oleh asing hingga 27 Juni 2007 mencapai Rp81,78 triliun atau naik 47,6 persen dibandingkan periode yang sama tahun lalu , yaitu Rp55,40 triliun , namun turun 2 persen dari posisi Mei , Rp83,48 triliun , demikian dikutip dari situs resmi Ditjen Perbendaharaan Depkeu , Selasa .

English: On the contrary , state banks' ownership in June 2007 fell 3.1 percent to Rp148.79 trillion from Rp153.68 trillion in June 2006 but rose 1.7 percent from Rp146.30 trillion in May 2007 , the directorate general of treasury said in its official website on Tuesday .
Indonesia: Sebaliknya , kepemilikan SBN oleh perbankan BUMN rekap malah mengalami penurunan 3,1 persen dari Rp153,68 triliun pada Juni 2006 menjadi Rp148,79 triliun pada Juni 2007 , meski dibandingkan dengan Mei 2007 terjadi kenaikan 1,7 persen dari Rp146,30 triliun .

English: Private banks' ownership dropped 4.9 percent to Rp77.72 trillion in June 2007 from Rp81.73 trillion in June 2006 but increased 4.14 percent from Rp74.63 trillion in May 2007 .
Indonesia: Demikian juga dengan kepemilikan SUN oleh bank swasta rekap mengalami penurunan 4,9 persen dari Rp81,73 triliun pada Juni 2006 menjadi Rp77,72 triliun , walau dibandingkan dengan Mei 2007 terjadi kenaikan 4,14 persen dari Rp74,63 triliun .

English: Mutual funds saw the highest increase in the ownership of local currency state bonds among non-bank financial institutions with 79.46 percent from Rp13.83 trillion in June 2006 to Rp24.82 trillion in June 2007 , followed by securities companies 20.58 percent from Rp340 billion to Rp410 billion , insurance companies 10.33 percent from Rp33.09 trillion to Rp36.51 trillion and pension funds 3.93 percent from Rp22.64 trillion to Rp23 trillion .
Indonesia: Untuk lembaga keuangan non perbankan , reksadana mencatat kenaikan terbesar , yaitu 79,46 persen dari Rp13,83 triliun menjadi Rp24,82 triliun ; kemudian diikuti berturut-turut oleh sekuritas 20,58 persen dari Rp340 miliar menjadi Rp410 miliar , asuransi 10,33 persen dari Rp33,09 triliun menjadi Rp36,51 triliun , dan dana pensiun 3,93 persen dari Rp22,64 triliun menjadi 23,53 triliun .

English: State banks took the lead by holding 32.71 percent of the total local currency state bonds as of June 2007 , followed by foreign investors 17.98 percent , private banks 17.08 percent , insurance companies 8.02 percent , mutual funds 5.45 percent , and pension funds 5.2 percent .
Indonesia: Secara persentase untuk kepemilikan SBN hingga Juni 2007 , perbankan BUMN rekap masih menempati peringkat teratas dengan porsi 32,71 persen , asing 17,98 persen , perbankan swasta rekap 17,08 persen , asuransi 8,02 persen , perbankan non rekap 6,91 persen , reksadana 5,45 persen , dana pensiun 5,2 persen , BI 3,06 persen , BPD 0,85 persen , sekuritas 0,12 persen dan lain-lain 2,62 persen .

English: Overall , banks' ownership of rupiah-denominated state bonds stood at Rp261.86 trillion as of June 27 , 2007 , accounting for 57.57 percent of the total .
Indonesia: Perbankan secara umum mendominasi kepemilikan SBN hingga 27 Juni 2007 , yaitu Rp261,86 triliun atau 57,57 persen dibandingkan seluruh SUN domestik yang diperdagangkan sebesar Rp454,82 triliun .

English: If combined with non-tradable securities and US dollar-denominated state bonds , the total value of state bonds issued by the government until June 27 , 2007 reached Rp779.048 trillion , up 1.10 percent from a month earlier .
Indonesia: Jika digabungkan dengan obligasi negara yang tidak bisa diperdagangkan dan obligasi dalam denominasi dolar AS , maka hingga 27 Juni jumlah SBN yang diterbitkan pemerintah telah mencapai Rp779,048 triliun , atau naik 1,10 persen dari posisi akhir Mei 2007 sebesar Rp770,555 triliun .

English: Up to June 27 , 2007 , the amount of non-tradable securities reached Rp260.433 trillion .
Indonesia: Hingga 27 Juni 2007 , obligasi negara yang tidak bisa diperdagangkan non-tradable securities mencapai Rp260,433 triliun

English: State gas distributor PT PGN has revised downward its estimate of gas distribution for 2007 to 413 mmscfd millions metric standard cubic feet per day from 453 mmscfd .
Indonesia: PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk PGN merevisi estimasi volume distribusi gas 2007 , yang semula 453 MMscfd menjadi 413 MMscfd .

English: In addition , many new gas subscribers were still unable to use gas optimally according to their contracts , he said .
Indonesia: Menurutnya revisi tersebut juga atas dasar perkiraan penyerapan gas ke pelanggan pada Oktober 2007 yang lebih rendah dari perkiraan semula .

English: The low gas consumption was also partly caused by the distribution pipelines which are now under the process of completion , he said .
Indonesia: Sehingga perseroan memutuskan untuk merevisi target volume distribusi gas 2007 , katanya .

English: Actually , the gas supplies from the Pagardewa field to the South Sumatra-West Java pipelines reached 130 mmscfd in August 2007 but the customers' gas consumption only averaged 104 mmscfd , he said .
Indonesia: Meskipun volume pengaliran gas dari Pagardewa ke pipa South Sumatera West Java SSWJ pada Agustus 2007 pernah mencapai 130 MMscfd , namun penyerapan gas ke pelanggan pada Agustus rata-rata hanya 104 juta kaki kubik per hari , kata Sekretaris Perusahaan PGN , Heri Yusuf kepada Bursa Efek Jakarta BEJ , Selasa .

English: Bank Indonesia central bank on Thursday decided to cut its benchmark rate by another 25 basis points to 8.5 percent after considering the prospects for the government's effort to attain the inflation rate target of 6-5 , plus and minus 1 , percent for 2008 .
Indonesia: Rapat Dewan Gubernur Bank Indonesia BI memutuskan untuk menurunkan suku bunga acuan BI atau BI rate sebesar 25 basis poin menjadi 8,5 persen setelah mempertimbangkan prospek pencapaian sasaran inflasi sebesar 6 plus minus 1 persen dan 5 plus minus 1 persen pada 2008 .

English: The Finance Deposit Ratio FDR of syariah banking in the same period also reached over 100 percent , far in excess of the Loan to Deposit Ratio LDR which was about 70 percent , the central bank governor said .
Indonesia: Demikian juga finance deposit ratio FDR perbankan syariah pada periode yang sama telah mencapai di atas 100 persen atau jauh dari loan to deposit ratio LDR yang masih berkisar 70 persen .

English: Seeing the development of syariah banking in the country , the President said he wanted to see the bills on syariah banking and on national syariah promissary notes passed into law immediately .
Indonesia: Melihat perkembangan pencapai pertumbuhan perbankan syariah Indonesia , Presiden berharap proses penyelesaian pembahasan RUU Perbankan Syariah dan RUU Sertifikat Berharga Syariah Nasional dapat segera diselesaikan .

English: The government and the House of Representatives want to finalize the two bills on time because they can help strengthen the syariah financial industry in the country , he said .
Indonesia: Pemerintah dan DPR sungguh ingin menyelesaikan dua UU ini tepat pada waktunya karena dapat memperkokoh industri keuangan syariah serta menjadi insentif bagi para investor , katanya .

English: Funding for UMKMs in November 2007 reached Rp19 trillion or two times the amount of funds for non-UMKMs which stood at Rp7.9 trillion , he said .
Indonesia: Periode November 2007 pembiayaan UMKM mencapai Rp19 triliun atau lebih tinggi dua kali lipat dari pembiayaan non UMKM yang hanya sebesar Rp7,9 triliun , kata Presiden .

English: ? PT Antam plans to buy back its shares from the capital market and a team has been appointed to study it .
Indonesia: PT Antam rencanakan pembelian kembali sahamnya di pasar modal , yang saat ini sedang dikaji oleh satu tim yang ditunjuk Antam dan diharapkan kajian tersebut rampung akhir November 2008 .

English: We indeed plan to conduct a buyback but we do not know how many shares we would buy back and at what price .
Indonesia: Kami memang berencana melakukan buy back , tapi kita belum tahu berapa besar volume saham yang akan di buy back tersebut , begitu juga pada harga berapa buy back itu akan dilaksanakan , kita belum tahu .

English: Let us just wait for the result of the study which is expected to finish by the end of November , its president director , Alwin Syah Loebis , said here on Tuesday .
Indonesia: Kita tunggu saja hasil kajian yang diharapkan selesai akhir November , kata Dirut Antam , Alwin Syah Loebis di Jakarta , Selasa .

English: Alwin said after the study was finished the company would ask for an approval from the shareholders through a shareholders general meeting .
Indonesia: Alwin mengatakan setelah selesai kajian , Antam akan meminta persetujuan pemegang saham melalui RUPS .

English: When asked if the company had asked for an approval from the state minister for state-owned firms he said net yet .
Indonesia: Saat ditanya apakah rencana buy back ini sudah dimintakan persetujuan Meneg BUMN , Alwin mengatakan belum .

English: We will discuss it with the minister later , he said .
Indonesia: Nanti akan kami bicarakan dengan Meneg BUMN , katanya .

English: As it is generally known the price of Antam shares at the capital market has continued to drop in the past six months in line with the decreasing price of nickel which is the main product of the company .
Indonesia: Sebagaimana diketahui saat ini harga Antam di pasar modal terus turun selama enam bulan terakhir ini seiring dengan melemahnya harga komoditi nikel yang menjadi andalam Antam .

English: In the first semester this year the company's net profit also dropped by more than 40 percent .
Indonesia: Selain itu pada semester I 2008 perolehan laba bersih Antam juga ikut melorot sekitar 40 persen lebih .

English: In the trading on Tuesday the price of Antam shares was closed at Rp1,050 per share or up Rp30 per share .
Indonesia: Pada perdagangan hari ini harga saham Antam ditutup pada level Rp 1.050 per saham atau naik Rp30 per saham .

English: In the morning trading the shares were traded at Rp910 per share .
Indonesia: Padahal sebelumnya harga Antam sempat anjlok sampai ke level Rp910 per saham .

English: He said when the price of Antam shares were declining while it stood at Rp1,800 per share , the management had already planned to conduct a buyback .
Indonesia: Menurutnya ketika harga Antam sempat turun pada saat harga Rp 1.800 , manajemen telah mewacanakan untuk melakukan buy back .

English: At the time however we just embarked on a serious step towards it .
Indonesia: Namun pada saat ini baru kita melangkah serius untuk buy back .

English: Regarding the funds for the plan , Alwin declined to elaborate telling only
Indonesia: Mengenai dana untuk buy back Alwin belum bersedia mengungkapkan .

English: what is clear is we have internal funds totalling US $ 360 million .
Indonesia: Yang jelas kita punya dana internal 360 juta dolar AS , kata Alwin

English: Meanwhile now is actually the time for the company to do it .
Indonesia: Padahal sebenarnya saat ini merupakan momentum yang tepat bagi Antam untuk melakukan buy back , karena harganya sangat murah .

English: Indeed the price of the Antam shares is now low but to buy them back we still need to conduct a study and an approval from the shareholders , he said .
Indonesia: Memang saat ini harga Antam sedang murah , tapi untuk buy back kami harus melakukan kajian dulu dan persetujuan pemegang saham , kata Alwin .

English: PT Indofood Sukses Makmur INDF has bought 100 percent of Drayton Pte Ltd Drayton's shares , including Drayton shareholders' claims amounting to US $ 100.5 million , an INDF spokesperson said .
Indonesia: PT Indofood Sukses Makmur INDF telah membeli 100 persen saham Drayton Pte Ltd Drayton , termasuk piutang pemegang saham senilai 100,5 juta dolar AS .

English: On September 22,2008 , INDF signed a conditional sales-and - purchase agreement with Pastila Investment Limited on 100 percent of Drayton's shares , including US $ 100.5 million worth of shareholders' claims , Marianty Setiawan , INDF's corporate secretary , said here Tuesday .
Indonesia: INDF telah menandatangani perjanjian jual beli bersyarat dengan Pastilla Investment Limited Senin untuk mengakuisisi 100 persen saham Drayton , termasuk piutang pemegang saham senilai 100,5 juta dolar AS , kata Sekretaris Perusahaan INDF Warianty Setiawan , dalam Keterbukaan Informasinya , Selasa .

English: She said Drayton was a Singaporean company controlling 68.57 percent of Indolakto shares which would be acquired by INDF .
Indonesia: Ia juga mengungkapkan bahwa Drayton adalah perusahaan di Singapura yang memiliki 68,57 persen saham PT Indolakto yang seluruhnya akan diakuisisi oleh perseroan .

English: Indolakto was a producer of milk and milk products circulating in Indonesian markets under such brand names as Indomilk , Cap Enaak , Tiga Sapi , Orchid Butter and Indoeskrim .
Indonesia: Indolakto merupakan produsen susu dan turunannya , seperti yang ada di pasar Indonesia terkenal dengan merek dagang Indomilk , Cap Enaak , Tiga Sapi , Orchid Butter dan Indoeskrim .

English: The transaction to acquire Indolakto was valued at US $ 350 million of which 15 percent US $ 52,5 million would be paid at the signing of the purchase agreement and the rest US $ 297.5 million on the settlement date which would be seven days after fulfillment of all acquisition terms .
Indonesia: Nilai transaksi atas akuisisi Indolakto ini mencapai 350 juta dolar AS , dimana 15 persen 52,5 juta dolar akan dibayarkan pada saat perjanjian dan sisanya 297,5 juta dolar akan dibayarkan pada tanggal penyelesaian , yaitu tujuh hari setelah seluruh syarat rencana akuisisi terpenuhi .

English: Setiawan said the funds for the acquisition would come from internal sources and a bank loan .
Indonesia: Warianty juga mengungkapkan bahwa dana akuisisi ini berasal dari dana internal dan pinjaman bank .

English: We plan to complete the acquisition process in December 2008 , she said .
Indonesia: Rencana akuisisi diharapkan akan diselesaikan pada Desember 2008 , harapnya .

English: She also said the transaction was a material one and thus it had to be approved by an INDF extraordinary general shareholders' meeting .
Indonesia: Ia juga mengungkapkan bahwa transaksi ini merupakan transaksi material , sehingga akan dimintakan persetujuan dalam Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa RUPSLB .

English: Director General of Debt Management at the Finance Ministry Rahmat Waluyanto said here Wednesday Indonesia still had good chances to get soft loans from several countries to overcome its State Budget deficit .
Indonesia: Dirjen Pengelolaan Utang Depkeu , Rahmat Waluyanto mengungkapkan bahwa Indonesia masih memiliki peluang mendapatkan pinjaman lunak dari berbagai negara melalui berbagai program untuk menutup defisit APBN .

English: As long as we have good programs to be sponsored such as poverty reduction , corruption eradication , climate change , education , and health , I believe many parties will be interested to help Indonesia by giving soft loans with milder terms and conditions said Rahmat at the finance ministry building .
Indonesia: Asalkan kita punya program-program yang bagus seperti pengentasan kemiskinan , pemberantasan korupsi , climate change , pendidikan , kesehatan , saya rasa akan banyak pihak yang tertarik terutama bilateral untuk membantu Indonesia dengan pinjaman yang term and conditionnya lebih ringan , kata Rahmat Waluyanto di Gedung Depkeu Jakarta , Rabu .

English: For example , he said , France , through the French Development Agency AFD , had this year given loans to the Regional Budgets APBDs through the climate change program .
Indonesia: Ia mencontohkan , Perancis melalui Badan Perancis untuk Pembangunan AFD pada 2008 ini memberikan pinjaman dalam APBN melalui program climate change yaitu program untuk mengeliminir dampak perubahan iklim .

English: Indonesia itself had a policy matrix in relation to the program so that the AFD gave soft loan commitments amounting to US $ 200 million .
Indonesia: Pemerintah Indonesia sudah memiliki policy matrix terkait program itu sehingga AFD memberikan komitmen pinjaman lunak sebesar 200 juta dolar AS .

English: The authorities had been proposing an addition of another US $ 100 million so that this year's loan could be US $ 300 million .
Indonesia: Diupayakan ada tambahan sehingga tahun ini jumlahnya 300 juta dolar AS .

English: This is beyond our own estimates , he said .
Indonesia: Ini di luar dugaan kita , katanya .

English: Rahmat also said several parties such as the Japan Bank for International Cooperation JBIC , Germany , Italy , and England were also still interested to give financial aid to Indonesia .
Indonesia: Menurut dia , sejumlah pihak seperti Japan Bank International Corporation JBIC , Jerman , Italia , dan Inggris masih tertarik untuk memberikan pinjaman lunak .

English: They are still interested although they may give the assistance in the form of swap deals instead of loans .
Indonesia: Mereka masih tertarik meskipun bukan dalam bentuk program loan , tapi swap .

English: Therefore , I think we still have good prospects to fund our State Budget , he said .
Indonesia: Jadi saya kira untuk mengelola utang dengan baik kita masih punya prospek yang sangat baik untuk membiayai APBN , katanya .

English: State Enterprises Minister Sofyan Djalil said the government would complete the divestment of 82.7 percent of the shares of Bank Indonesia the central bank in PT Bahana Pembinaan Usaha Indonesia before the end of this year .
Indonesia: Menneg BUMN Sofyan Djalil mengatakan , pemerintah akan menyelesaikan pengalihan kepemilikan 82,7 persen saham Bank Indonesia BI pada PT Bahana Pembinaan Usaha Indonesia Bahana sebelum akhir tahun 2008 .

English: The divestment of Bank Indonesia BI shares in Bahana must be accomplished this year so that BI , in line with the law , will no longer have shares in the company , Djalil said at his office .
Indonesia: Tahun ini divestasi saham BI di Bahana harus rampung sehingga BI sesuai Undang-Undang tidak lagi memiliki saham di perusahaan itu , kata Sofyan Djalil , di Kantor Kementerian BUMN , Jakarta , Rabu .

English: He said negotiations on the matter were still continuing with two options on offer , namely selling the shares to the government and / or giving them to the government as a grant .
Indonesia: Menurut Sofyan , pembahasan divestasi saham BI tersebut terus berlangsung dengan dua opsi yaitu menjual kepada pemerintah , dan atau menghibahkannya .

English: The settlement of the problem also depends on the financial condition of PT Bahana , he said .
Indonesia: Penyelesaian juga tergantung pada kondisi keuangan Bahana saat ini , katanya .

English: According to records PT Bahana is now facing financial difficulties because of its debt to the government totaling Rp369.4 billion and US $ 98 million .
Indonesia: Menurut catatan , Bahana sedang dalam kondisi kesulitan keuangan terkait dengan utang Rekening Dana Investasi RDI kepada pemerintah Depkeu sebesar Rp369,4 miliar dan 98 juta dolar AS .

English: The company had asked for the restructuring several times including asking to set-off its Investment Fund Account debt with compensation funds .
Indonesia: Bahana berkali-kali meminta restrukturisasi tetapi selalu gagal , termasuk meminta kewajiban pinjaman RDI dengan uang pengganti .

English: PT Bahana received a loan from the government's Investment Fund Account on December 16 , 1998 totaling Rp250 billion .
Indonesia: Adapun Bahana mendapat pinjaman rekening dana investasi dari pemerintah pada 16 Desember 1998 , sebesar Rp 250 miliar .

English: When it was due the company failed to pay the principal , interest and fines due .
Indonesia: Saat jatuh tempo , Bahana gagal membayar utang akumlasi utang pokok , bunga dan denda .

English: Djalil said the essence of the problem was releasing the BI shares because in line with the law the central bank had to release its ownership in sister companies that were not in line with the bank's tasks .
Indonesia: Sofyan menambahkan , intinya adalah bagaimana saham BI dilepas karena sesuai dengan Undang-Undang BI harus melepaskan penyertaan pada anak-anak perusahaan yang tidak sejalan dengan tugas BI .

English: BI wants to respect the law and the BI law also states that the problem has to be settled before 2009 , he said .
Indonesia: BI ingin menghargai Undang-Undang , dan Undang-Undang BI juga menyebutkan bahwa masalah ini harus tuntas sebelum 2009 , katanya .

English: The minister said the question whether the shares would be sold or presented to the government as as grant was now still being worked out .
Indonesia: Solusinya pengalihan saham tersebut apakah dijual atau dihibahkan diutarakannya , sedang dalam penyelesaian .

English: The BI governor has sent a letter to the finance minister telling that in principle BI would release its ownership in Bahana .
Indonesia: Gubernur BI sedang mengirim surat kepada Menteri Keuangan Pemerintah bahwa pada prinsipnya BI akan melepaskan kepemilikannya di Bahana .

English: So there has not yet been any agreement , he said .
Indonesia: Jadi belum ada kesepakatan , katanya .

English: Regarding the possibility of BI choosing to sell the shares to the government , he said the government does not have the money for it .
Indonesia: Terkait kemungkinan BI memilih opsi menjual saham tersebut kepada pemerintah , Sofyan mengatakan Pemerintah tidak punya uang untuk membeli .

English: Publicly listed property firm PT Bakrieland Development Tbk ELTY is seeking to issue share bonds sukuk worth Rp200 billion-Rp300 billion next year to finance a number of its city property projects .
Indonesia: Perusahaan properti PT Bakrieland Development Tbk ELTY tengah mengkaji penerbitan obligasi negara syariah Sukuk senilai Rp 200 - 300 miliar pada 2009 .

English: It is true that we plan to issue sharia bonds .
Indonesia: Kami memang ada rencana ke arah situ .

English: The plan is still under consideration , ELTY President Director Hiramsyah S. Thaib said here on Friday .
Indonesia: Itu masih kita kaji , kata Presiden Direktur ELTY , Hiramsyah S. Thaib , di Jakarta Jumat .

English: He said the value of the sharia bonds would not be as high as that of the conventional bonds the company issued some time ago .
Indonesia: Meski tidak menyebut nilainya , namun Hiramsyah menegaskan besarannya tidak akan sebesar obligasi konvesional yang diterbitkan beberapa waktu lalu .

English: In March 2008 , the company issued two types of conventional bonds worth Rp500 billion payable in three years and five years each .
Indonesia: Pada Maret 2008 ELTY telah menerbitkan dua seri obligasi konvensional senilai Rp500 miliar dengan tenor masing-masing tiga dan lima tahun .

English: He said the company would use proceeds from the planned issuance of sharia bonds to finance a number of projects including Bogor Nirwana Residence BNR , Ijen Nirwana Residence in Malang , East Java , and Batam Nirwana Residence in Batam .
Indonesia: Hiramsyah mengatakan , rencana penerbitan sukuk untuk membiayai proyek city property dan pengembangan landed residensial milik ELTY yaitu Bogor Nirwana Residence BNR , Ijen Nirwana Residence Malang dan Batam Nirwana Residence Batam .

English: Through the cooperation , ELTY would sell stakes in its subsidiaries to the foreign investors , he said .
Indonesia: Seperti halnya proyek city property , menurut Hiramsyah , ELTY juga tengah menjajaki kerjasama dengan investor asing dengan melepas sebagian porsi anak usahanya di proyek-proyek residensial .

English: In the first phase , the company planned to sell a 30 percent stake in its subsidiary carrying out the BNR project in Bogor , West Java , he said .
Indonesia: Untuk tahap awal , perseroan berencana melepas sekitar 30 persen saham anak usahanya yang menggarap proyek BNR di Bogor .

English: The rupiah strengthened to Rp9,385 / 9,390 against the US dollar in the Jakarta interbank spot market on Friday morning after investors bought the local unit on signals Bank Indonesia BI will extend repurchase agreement repo facilities .
Indonesia: Kurs rupiah terhadap dolar AS di pasar spot antar bank Jakarta , Jumat pagi menguat kembali di bawah angka Rp9.400 per dolar AS menjadi Rp9.385 / 9.390 , karena pelaku pasar membeli rupiah , setelah Bank Indonesia BI berencana memperpanjang fasilitas repo .

English: The central bank has hinted it will extend three-month repo facilities to make them more attractive to curb tight market liquidity .
Indonesia: BI memperpanjang fasilitas repo jangka waktu hingga tiga bulan untuk menekan likuiditas pasar yang ketat , sehingga pergerakan rupiah makin membaik .

English: Foreign exchange analyst Rully Nova of PT Bank Himpunan Saudara Tbk said market liquidity pressure had gradually faded following the central bank's plan to extend the repo facilities .
Indonesia: Analis Valas PT Bank Himpunan Saudara Tbk , Rully Nova di Jakarta , Jumat mengatakan , likuiditas pasar makin berkurang dengan diperpanjang fasilitas repo yang mendorong rupiah kembali menguat .

English: We are optimistic local investors will still eye the rupiah until this evening so that it will leave the level of Rp9,400 per dollar far behind , he said .
Indonesia: Kami optimis rupiah masih dilirik investor lokal sampai sore nanti sehingga posisi akan makin menjauhi angka Rp9.400 per dolar AS , katanya .

English: It was still rather difficult for the rupiah to further appreciate as investors were focusing their attention on the US greenback's strengthening in the global market despite worries about the US economic growth , he said .
Indonesia: Rupiah untuk menguat lebih jauh memang agak berat , karena pelaku lokal khususnya asing masih fokus pada dolar AS yang di pasar global menguat , meski mereka khawatir dengan pertumbuhan ekonomi Amerika Serikat .

English: The Indonesian currency tumbled to nearly Rp9,500 per dollar in recent weeks due in part to a financial crisis in the US and Europe prompting foreign investors to buy up the dollar , he said .
Indonesia: Rupiah sempat terpuruk hingga mendekati level Rp9.500 per dolar AS terutama imbas dari krisis keuangan yang terjadi di Amerika Serikat dan Eropa yang memicu pelaku asing memborong dolar .

English: The dollar is strengthening amidst investors' worries about continued financial turmoil in the US .
Indonesia: Sementara itu dolar AS menguat di tengah kegelisahan para investor dalam menghadapi berlanjutnya kekacauan finansial dan kekhawatiran atas kesehatan sistem perbankan AS .

English: The euro fell to 1.4348 from 1.4323 against the dollar .
Indonesia: Euro turun menjadi 1,4348 per dolar dari 1,4323 dolar AS , Greenback juga meningkat menjadi 105,37 yen dari 104,56 yen .

English: The US greenback also appreciated agaiunst the yen to 105.37 from 104.56 previously .
Indonesia: Dolar sebelumnya melemah dalam beberapa hari terakhir sebagai reaksi atas pergolakan di sektor perbankan dan asuransi .

English: Three of five coal mining companies which the government recently reprimanded for failing to pay royalties for many years were on Friday reported to have honored their obligations .
Indonesia: Tiga perusahaan batu bara hingga Jumat siang memenuhi komitmen pembayaran jaminan royalti batu bara .

English: Soepomo , the finance ministry's director of multifarious state wealth , said here Friday the companies that had fulfilled their royatly paying obligations were PT Kideco Jaya Agung Rp110 billion , PT Adaro Indonesia Rp150 billion and PT Berau Coal Rp90 billion .
Indonesia: Tiga perusahaan dimaksud adalah PTB Kideco Jaya Agung dengan pembayaran sebesar Rp110 miliar , PT Adaro Indonesia sebesar Rp150 miliar , dan PT Berau Coal sebesar sekitar Rp90 miliar .

English: Kideco and Adaro made the payment yesterday and Berau Coal this afternoon , Soepomo said .
Indonesia: Kideco dan Adaro sudah membayar kemarin , dan hingga siang ini ada pembayaran dari Berau Coal , kata Soepomo .

English: Kideco , Adaro and Berau were among five coal companies that had previously refused to pay the royalties on the ground the government had yet to disburse tax restitutions to which they were entitled .
Indonesia: Kideco , Adaro , dan Berau merupakan tiga dari lima perusahaan yang menunggak pembayaran royalti batu bara karena merasa memiliki reimbursement tagihan kepada pemerintah .

English: But the government had told the companies the royalties issue was not linked to the tax restitution problem and therefore they were expected to pay the royalties as soon as possible .
Indonesia: Pemerintah menilai piutang royalti batu bara berbeda dengan reimbursment sehingga penunggak royalti batu bara harus segera melunasi tunggakan itu .

English: The government had also said it would try to solve both problems at the same time by asking the companies to pay a warranty of Rp600 billion and the Development Finances ComptrollerBPKP to conduct audits on the royalties and tax restitution claims .
Indonesia: Pemerintah berupaya menyelesaikan masalah piutang royalti dan reimbursment secara bersamaan di mana pemerintah meminta penunggak royalti batu bara memberikan jaminan sebesar Rp600 miliar dan pemerintah melalui BPKP melakukan audit atas piutang royalti batu bara dan reimbursment itu .

English: The two other coal companies owing royalties to the government --- PT Kaltim Prima Coal KPC and PT Arutmin -- had already promised to meet their obligations , Soepomo said .
Indonesia: Perusahaan lain yang sudah memberikan komitmen segera membayar jaminan PT Kaltim Prima Coal KPC sebesar Rp150 milyar dan PT Arutmin Indonesia Rp100 Milyar .

English: Soepomo declined to answer when asked what the government would do if the two companies had not paid the royallties by September 19 .
Indonesia: Ketika ditanya langkah apa yang akan dilakukan pemerintah jika sampai batas waktu tanggal 19 September 2008 ini , perusahaan batu bara tidak memenuhi komitmen membayar jaminan , Soepomo menolak memberikan jawaban .

English: Vice President Jusuf Kalla said Friday the current global liquidity crisis has only led to a 0.1 percent drop in Indonesia's gross domestic product GDP .
Indonesia: Wakil Presiden Jusuf Kalla mengatakan krisis likuiditas keuangan yang sekarang sedang melanda dunia hanya berpengaruh 0,1 persen penurunannya pada Gross Domestic Product GDP Indonesia .

English: Indonesia is one of the Asian countries recording the lowest declines in GDP , he told the press after Friday prayers at his office here .
Indonesia: Indonesia adalah salah satu negara yang perubahan GDP-nya paling kecil di antara negara Asia lainnya , kata Wapres kepada wartawan usai sholat Jumat di Istana Wapres Jakarta .

English: The decline in Indonesia's GDP to 6.3 percent from 6.4 percent previously was not sharp compared to the economic setbacks in the United States , European countries , Japan , China , India and Thailand which were all directly affected by the liquidity crisis , he said .
Indonesia: Penurunan GDP Indonesia , menurut Wapres , dari 6,4 menjadi 6,3 persen , tidak besar dibanding AS , Eropa , Jepang , China , India dan Thailand yang mengalami dampak secara langsung .

English: As the largest exporting country , China saw a 2 percent drop in its GDP , he said .
Indonesia: China karena ekspornya terbesar terimbas sampai 2 persen , kata Wapres .

English: The global liquidity crisis was having a small impact on Indonesia's GDP because , unlike many developed nations , Indonesia had not placed capital in US financial institutions such as Lehman Brothers and AIG , he said .
Indonesia: Wapres mengatakan pengaruh yang kecil itu karena Indonesia tidak menempatkan modalnya di lembaga keuangan AS Lehman Brothers dan AIG Life seperti halnya banyak negara maju .

English: He added , however , the liquidity crisis would reduce US investment in Indonesia and depress the prices of Indonesia's exports to the US .
Indonesia: Namun demikian investasi AS ke Indonesia akan menurun , demikian pula ekspor komoditas Indonesia ke AS juga akan mengalami penurunan harga , meski bukan penurunan jumlah .

English: Commenting on the fall in global crude prices , the vice president said he could as yet not say whether it would have an impact on the fuel subsidy provided for in the 2008 state budget .
Indonesia: Dalam kesempatan itu , Wapres juga menjawab soal penurunan harga minyak dunia yang belum bisa dipastikan akan berlanjut atau tidak , sehingga belum bisa mempengaruhi kebijakan soal subsidi minyak dalam APBN .

English: The global crude prices are still fluctuating above US $ 100 per barrel Last night they fell to US $ 97 a barrel .
Indonesia: Harga minyak dunia masih fluktuatif masih sekitar 100 dolar per barel , tadi malam 97 dolar .

English: Meanwhile , the assumed oil price in the state budget is based on the average crude price .
Indonesia: sementara anggaran selalu berdasar rata-rata .

English: In addition , the amount of oil subsidy set in the state budget is Rp150 trillion , he said .
Indonesia: Selain itu subsidi masih Rp150 triliun , katanya .

English: President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono said 12 of the country's 33 provinces in the first half of 2008 recorded a higher-than-national economic growth rate of 6.4 percent .
Indonesia: Presiden Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono mengatakan , sampai dengan triwulan II 2008 terdapat 12 propinsi mencatat pertumbuhan ekonomi di atas pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional tahunan sebesar 6,4 persen .

English: The regional economic growth is one of the yardsticks for the success of the national economic development , the president said in his address on the government's explanations on regional development policies at the plenary session of the Regional Representative Council DPD here on Friday .
Indonesia: Pertumbuhan ekonomi daerah salah satu tolok ukur keberhasilan pelaksanaan pembangunan ekonomi nasional , kata Presiden pada keterangan pemerintah tentang Kebijakan Pembangunan Daerah pada Sidang Paripurna Dewan Perwakilan Daerah DPD-RI , di Gedung MPR / DPR , Jakarta , Jumat .

English: Even some of the provinces including Riau Islands , Central Kalimantan , South Kalimantan and Central Sulawesi saw an economic growth rate of more than 8.5 percent , he said .
Indonesia: Menurut Kepala Negara , bahkan beberapa dari provinsi tersebut memiliki pertumbuhan ekonomi yang sangat tinggi , di atas 8,5 persen , yaitu Provinsi Kepulauan Riau , Kalimantan Tengah , Kalimantan Selatan , dan Sulawesi Tengah .

English: The achievement is worthy of praise .
Indonesia: Prestasi ini layak kita berikan apresiasi

English: I hope that the provinces can maintain the achievement , he said .
Indonesia: saya berharap dapat terus dipertahankan , ujarnya .

English: Viewed from even distribution , the regional economic growth in the past four years was also encouraging , he said .
